author: brent.allsop
content:
Basically, there currently isn’t one canonical source of EIP information.  We’re trying to clean this up and make a single source of EIP info that is definitive, and easy to find.
Some of the changes we’d like to make are quite significant.  For example, @Mica wants to pull the EIP meta information out of EIP 1, and move it into a page on eips.ethererum.org.
So, I’m thinking it would be a good idea to get more review, than just a few people, if only for a heads up about changes, like moving EIP-1, about to happen.
Towards that end, I’m hoping there might be some kind of a staging version of eips.ethereum.org, on which we can put together a proposal, and make sure everyone is on board, with such significant changes, before doing a pull request for all that.
If there isn’t a staging system, I might be able to set one up, myself.
We’re putting together a proposal of what we want to do in this google doc:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hUpMQh9gA5z3WSDvXKqU_CS6g3Y0hugJZHDYQdKxot8/edit?usp=sharing
